entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
